title: Praktikannons: Front-end- eller Back-end-utvecklare
description:
**Praktikannons: Front-end- eller Back-end-utvecklare**

Är du en blivande utvecklare som vill kickstarta din karriär med verklig erfarenhet? sök till oss som praktikant och få praktisk exponering för den senaste tekniken och dra nytta av vägledning och stöd från erfarna handledare under hela din resa!

**Om oss:**

RedRiver Consulting and Software AB, är ett ledande konsult- och produktföretag specialiserat på system- och webbutveckling. Med en meritlista av att leverera skräddarsydda IT-lösningar och ge löpande support till några av Sveriges största företag och offentliga myndigheter, är vi stolta över vårt engagemang för spetskompetens och innovation. Vår expertis ligger i Angular 18 och React för frontend-utveckling och .NET Core och C# för backend-lösningar

**Praktikdetaljer:**

**Roll:** Front-end eller Back-end Developer Intern

**Praktiktyp:** Oavlönad praktik, oftast kombinerad med studier.

**Krav:**

* Grundläggande kunskaper om antingen front-end-utveckling med Angular eller React, eller back-end-utveckling med Java eller .NET C#.
* Iver att lära och bidra till spännande projekt.
* Stark problemlösningsförmåga och uppmärksamhet på detaljer.

**Ansvar:**

* Samarbeta med vårt erfarna team i riktiga projekt.
* Tillämpa dina kunskaper för att bygga lyhörda och användarvänliga gränssnitt eller robusta backend-system.
* Delta i SCRUM eller agila metoder.
* Möjlighet till tillväxt och lärande i en stödjande miljö.

**vill förtydliga att detta är en obetald praktik, den kombineras oftast med studier så obetald.** 

Jobbtyp: Heltid

Förmåner:

* Jobba hemifrån

Schema:

* Måndag till fredag

Arbetsort: Distans

Sista ansökningsdatum: 2025-02-03

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
*Vi tror på ett samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. Att vara en del av Fortnox är att vara en del av en ständig förändring - en förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Vårt största fokus är att ge dig rätt förutsättningar att få leva din passion tillsammans med oss. Var du kommer ifrån är inte relevant - det är vart du är på väg som är intressant för oss. Precis som vi igår inte kunde drömma om det Fortnox som finns idag, så kan du vara med och forma vilka vi är imorgon.*

 **Om tjänsten**  

Vill du vara med och utveckla nästa generation av vår produkt inom tidsredovisning? Nu söker vi en fullstack-utvecklare till vårt helt nya team på Fortnox! Produkten bygger vidare på en delvis befintlig lösning men kommer att utvecklas med modern teknologi och helt ny funktionalitet för att möta företagens behov av smidig tidsredovisning. Här skapar vi något både nytt och innovativt – en strategiskt viktig lösning för att hantera tid för fakturering och löneutbetalning.

**Vad du kommer att göra**  

Du kommer att vara en del av ett tvärfunktionellt team där vi tillsammans ansvarar för produktens hela livscykel. Vi arbetar med:

* **Frontend**: Webbaserat gränssnitt i React och mobilappar i React Native.
* **Backend**: Microservice-arkitektur utvecklad i Java och Kotlin.
* Integrationer via **REST-API** och datalagring i **SQL-databaser**.


Vi använder oss av **Product Operational Model**, där vi experimenterar och undersöker för att identifiera de kundproblem som skapar mest värde att lösa. Genom nära samarbete med våra användare och kollegor levererar vi lösningar som är både användarvänliga och prioriterade inom Fortnox.  

  



**Om dig**  

Vi söker dig med några års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, gärna med erfarenhet av:

* **Java**, **React**, **React Native** och **TypeScript**.
* **REST-API** och **SQL-databaser**.
* Enhetstester och kvalitetsdriven utveckling.


Som person är du prestigelös, nyfiken och brinner för att lära dig nytt. Du gillar att dela din kunskap och ser samarbete som nyckeln till framgång.

**Vi erbjuder**


På Fortnox värdesätter vi innovation, kvalitet och hållbara tekniska lösningar. Här får du chansen att vara med från början – i ett nytt team, med en ny produkt och nya arbetssätt. Du blir en del av en dynamisk och kreativ miljö där vi kombinerar teknik, design och kundfokus för att skapa något unikt.


Tjänsten är placerad i Växjö och kräver goda kunskaper i svenska. Då teamet är nytt och produkten komplex ser vi gärna att du arbetar på plats en del av tiden.


Skicka in din ansökan redan idag och ta chansen att bli en del av något stort på Fortnox!

  

**Om Fortnox**  

*Fortnox AB (publ) är en företagsplattform som knyter samman människor, företag och organisationer. Vi hjälper företag starta, växa och utvecklas. Med smarta tekniska produkter, lösningar och tjänster, och möjlighet att koppla ihop dem med hundratals externa parter, är vi ett nav för företagande i Sverige. Vår vision är att skapa ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag. Fortnox grundades 2001 och har huvudkontor i Växjö samt kontor i Malmö, Linköping och Stockholm. Aktien är noterad på Nasdaq Stockholm. För ytterligare information se* *www.fortnox.se**.*

**Välkommen med din ansökan!**


#LI-PS1

title: Emedded-utvecklare till Prevas Uppsala
description:
**Vill du vara med och utveckla teknik som gör skillnad på riktigt? Hos Prevas Uppsala får du chansen att arbeta i en stimulerande miljö där innovation och samhällsnytta står i centrum. Som en del av vårt engagerade team får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste teknologin, bidra till banbrytande lösningar inom medicinteknik och Life Science, och växa både personligt och professionellt. Om du söker en roll där din kompetens värderas högt och där du är omgiven av kollegor som stöttar och inspirerar – då är Prevas Uppsala rätt plats för dig!**  

  

**Om Prevas Uppsala**  

Prevas är ett tekniskt konsultföretag som erbjuder lösningar, tjänster och produkter till företag inom en rad olika branscher. I Uppsala arbetar Prevas primärt inom Medicinteknik och Life Science med utveckling av produkter som på ett eller annat sätt skapar samhällsnytta. Analytiska instrument inom patientvård eller forskning är ett exempel och Prevas har vana av helhetsåtaganden, vilket innebär att deras kunder kan komma med en enkel idé eller skiss så tar de det därifrån hela vägen till färdig produkt. Medicintekniska företag lägger helt enkelt sin framtid i Prevas händer och vi vill gärna att du är med och skapar den!


Prevas Uppsala är ca 50 medarbetare inom system, mjukvara, hårdvara, elektronik och kvalitet och sitter centralt på Kungsgatan i Uppsala, nära tåget och nära kunderna!

 **Prevas Uppsala erbjuder**

* En stimulerande arbetsmiljö med fokus på innovation och kvalitet.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste teknologin och utveckla dina färdigheter.
* Ett engagerat och stöttande team som värdesätter samarbete och utveckling.
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmåner.

  

**Om teamet och rollen**  

Teamet består av både juniora och seniora utvecklare som gärna delar kunskaper med varandra. Det är en ganska jämn fördelning där hälften räknar sig som embedded-utvecklare och andra halvan jobbar främst med .NET. Det bästa teamet vet är när de har ett inhouse-projekt på Prevas-kontoret, för då får teamet jobba tillsammans och ofta också med andra kollegor från mekanik och elektronik-gruppen. Med det sagt är Prevas Uppsala väldigt uppskattade ute på plats hos deras kunder också.


Anders som är chef för teamet har som filosofi att alla ska tycka att det är kul att gå upp på morgonen och dra i väg till jobbet. Givetvis kan en måndagsmorgon i november dämpa den känslan men uppdraget man utför ska i alla fall vara intressant och utvecklande för den enskilda medarbetaren.


På Prevas tror man på att teknik gör världen bättre. Och för att lyckas göra den bättre, behöver de personer som dig. De kommer att ge dig ansvar och har full tilltro till att du som expert inom området har de bästa lösningarna. De har nämligen en stark tro på människan och är övertygade om att din utveckling är vår utveckling. Prevas vet också att deras gemensamma kompetens blir starkare när man hjälper varandra och bryr sig. Därför bygger deras kultur på just det, att finnas där för varandra och ha kul längs vägen.

 **Om dig**  

Vi söker dig som idag jobbar som embedded-utvecklare och har jobbat minst 5 år med relevanta arbetsuppgifter, vilket gör att du känner dig bekväm i rollen som utvecklare.


Du har erfarenhet att utveckla i C och/eller C++ och drivs av att lösa problem. Vi ser gärna att du också provat på lite andra språk som Python och kanske C#.

  

Vi ser även att du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska.


Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Du är en positiv person som alltid sätter kunden i fokus genom att vara utåtriktad, flexibel, initiativrik och drivande. Du drivs du av att lösa problem och dela med dig av dina erfarenheter till andra.

 **Välkommen med din ansökan!**  

Rekryteringen kommer hållas av Ed:Za Group. Har du några frågor eller funderingar relaterade till tjänsten och processen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta charlotte.hoffstrom@edzagroup.se

title: Senior SIL Developer
description:
*Nexer R&D is at the forefront of tomorrow's technology and is continuously growing. We seek a dedicated SIL Developer who enjoys problem-solving tasks in a collaborative environment. Could that be you?*

**This is Nexer R&D**


Here you are part of a very friendly, warm and vibrant high-tech community of problem solvers, where new ideas and initiatives are encouraged and nurtured. Whether you work with one of our Nexer teams at Lindholmen or on-site with our customers in the Gothenburg area, you will have the flexibility to explore and implement new ideas - anywhere, anytime!


Our focus is on product development companies, and we work extensively with clients in industries such as automotive and defense. As a consultant and a senior SIL Developer, you may have to opportunity to lead or architect software development in vehicles, focusing on SIL systems. For example, you can design, guide architecture and also work hands-on with code.


At Nexer R&D, we have a safe learning culture where we help each other reach new levels – whether in the context of the assignment or related to your personal career goals. To further promote this, you can take various courses through Nexer Academy and certificates through Udemy. Join us and become part of a community that values development, creativity, and collaboration.

**Are you the one we are looking for?**


We are looking for someone with a long track record in the automotive industry. You should have at least a B.Sc. degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a closely related field.


If you have experience in:

* SIL (Software in the Loop)
* C/C++
* Automotive industry


Then there is a great chance that you will succeed in the role!


Our employees like to solve technical problems together. They often work in cross-functional teams and value good collaboration and communication. Do you want to be part of such a team?

**Application**


Please, go ahead and submit your application. Unfortunately, we are not able to handle applications via e-mail, but if you have questions about the position or Nexer, please contact Victoria Olsson: victoria.olsson@nexergroup.com. We accept applications on an ongoing basis, so do not wait to apply!

**About NEXER GROUP**

***Nexer as an employer***

*If you work at Nexer, you get a bold and entrepreneurial employer with an international presence. We take pride in leading the digital revolution and being at the forefront of technology, always with an agile and forward-looking approach. With us, you get unique opportunities to dream big, act smart and develop. As a family-owned company, we own our strategy and invest in long-term goals, and we encourage employee involvement and ideas. In addition, we offer a flexible work policy, where it’s possible to work remotely when it suits you and your assignment.*

***Our culture***

*Our vision is Promising future – it’s* *important for us to make a difference and contribute to a better future. We are committed to our customers and have a sincere concern for each other. We embrace diversity and believe that people with different backgrounds and experiences* *make* *our work and our company* *better. We value innovation and the will to develop and take the next step,* *onwards* *and upwards. And most importantly* *– we have fun at work!*  

  

#LI-VO1

title: Sr Backend Developer Node JS + AI (100% remote - Sweden)
description:
At Tether, we’re not just building products, we’re pioneering a global financial revolution. Our cutting-edge solutions empower businesses—from exchanges and wallets to payment processors and ATMs—to seamlessly integrate reserve-backed tokens across blockchains. By harnessing the power of blockchain technology, Tether enables you to store, send, and receive digital tokens instantly, securely, and globally, all at a fraction of the cost. Transparency is the bedrock of everything we do, ensuring trust in every transaction.

 ***Innovate with Tether***  

**Tether Finance:** Our innovative product suite features the world’s most trusted stablecoin, **USDT**, relied upon by hundreds of millions worldwide, alongside pioneering digital asset tokenization services.  

But that’s just the beginning:  

**Tether Power:** Driving sustainable growth, our energy solutions optimize excess power for Bitcoin mining using eco-friendly practices in state-of-the-art, geo-diverse facilities.  

**Tether Data:** Fueling breakthroughs in AI and peer-to-peer technology, we reduce infrastructure costs and enhance global communications with cutting-edge solutions like **KEET**, our flagship app that redefines secure and private data sharing.  

**Tether Education**: Democratizing access to top-tier digital learning, we empower individuals to thrive in the digital and gig economies, driving global growth and opportunity.  

**Tether Evolution**: At the intersection of technology and human potential, we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible, crafting a future where innovation and human capabilities merge in powerful, unprecedented ways.  

  

***Why Join Us?***  

Our team is a global talent powerhouse, working remotely from every corner of the world. If you’re passionate about making a mark in the fintech space, this is your opportunity to collaborate with some of the brightest minds, pushing boundaries and setting new standards. We’ve grown fast, stayed lean, and secured our place as a leader in the industry.  

If you have excellent English communication skills and are ready to contribute to the most innovative platform on the planet, Tether is the place for you.  

  

Are you ready to be part of the future? **Responsibilities:**  

* Contribute to development of AI solutions across multiple products and platforms
* Participate in code review and development proposals.
* Uphold the highest performance, reliability and security standards in every development.
* Node/JavaScript Expertise: Very proficient in Node.js and JavaScript programming.
* AI Development Experience: Proficient in working on AI related applications such as RAG, Agents, Inference, finetuning and training.
* Microservices Architecture: Familiarity with microservices architecture for scalable applications.
* Peer-to-Peer Technologies: Understanding of Peer-to-Peer technologies.
* Database Interaction: Proficiency in interacting with databases such as MySQL and MongoDB.
* Quick Learner: Ability to quickly adapt and learn new technologies.
* Security Awareness: Strong understanding and experience implementing best security practices.
* Additional Programming Skills: Knowledge of Ruby, Rust, or C++ is advantageous

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
*Vi tror på ett samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. Att vara en del av Fortnox är att vara en del av en ständig förändring - en förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Nu söker vi en fullstackutvecklare som blir en viktig pusselbit i att skapa en välkomnande, enkel och effektiv vardag för våra kunder. Hos oss kommer du att vara en del av teamen som arbetar med produkterna Bokslut & Skatt, Avstämning och Enkelt årsavslut – produkter som är strategiskt viktiga för Fortnox.


Som utvecklare arbetar du i ett agilt team som ansvarar för produkterna från ax till limpa. Du och teamet tar stort ansvar för lösningens utformning och arbetar tillsammans för att leverera kvalitativa lösningar och produkter som är innovativa, hållbara och enkla att förvalta.

 **Vi söker dig som**

* Har några års erfarenhet av**professionell mjukvaruutveckling**.
* Rör dig med enkelhet mellan **backend** och **frontend**.
* Besitter goda kunskaper i **moderna programmeringstekniker**, gärna: **JavaScript/React** för frontendutveckling. **Node och/eller Java/Kotlin** för backend.
* Grundläggande förståelse för **PostgreSQL** är ett plus.
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta i **agila utvecklingsteam**.
* Har en god förmåga att uttrycka dig tydligt i både **tal och skrift**, på svenska och engelska.
* Meriterande om man har någon form av redovisningskunskap, från tex från att ha drivit eget företag, utbildning eller från tidigare yrke.


Fortnox är ett bolag i förändring och att arbeta hos oss innebär en omväxlande vardag. För att trivas i denna roll ser vi därför att du är lösningsorienterad och att du trivs med att jobba i en föränderlig miljö. Du är trygg i din kompetens, är självgående och tar gärna lead på kontinuerlig förbättring av metoder, verktyg och leveranser. Du håller dig uppdaterad om relevanta tekniker och verktyg, deltar i teambeslut och sprider gärna vidare din kunskap till dina kollegor på Fortnox.


**Tech stack:**

| Javascript | React | Node | Java | Kotlin | SQL | GIT |


**Vi erbjuder**


En plats i ett av våra autonoma team, där vi arbetar självgående men samtidigt tillsammans. Teamet inkluderar förutom utvecklare även kollegor med kompetenser inom kravhantering, produktdesign och kvalitetssäkring.


Fortnox tror på ett liv i balans och ”Fortnox MåBra” är ett koncept som finns för ditt välmående och återhämtning. Vi tror på flexibilitet och att arbeta på distans, samtidigt som vi vill erbjuda en kreativ arbetsmiljö för våra medarbetare. Teamet sitter på vårt huvudkontor i Växjö som är modernt, hemtrevligt, centralt beläget och präglat av en stark gemenskap.  

  



**Om Fortnox**  

*Fortnox AB (publ) är en företagsplattform som knyter samman människor, företag och organisationer. Vi hjälper företag starta, växa och utvecklas. Med smarta tekniska produkter, lösningar och tjänster, och möjlighet att koppla ihop dem med hundratals externa parter, är vi ett nav för företagande i Sverige. Vår vision är att skapa ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag. Fortnox grundades 2001 och har huvudkontor i Växjö samt kontor i Malmö, Linköping och Stockholm. Aktien är noterad på Nasdaq Stockholm. För ytterligare information se* *www.fortnox.se**.*

#LI-PS1

title: Senior Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Som systemutvecklare på IT-avdelningen ingår du i ett agilt utvecklingsteam som levererar lösningar, tjänster och integrationer i samverkan med verksamheten.  

Arbetet bedrivs med kundupplevelsen i fokus och med frekventa leveranser.  

Vår gemensamma arbetsmetodik är baserad på Scaled Agile Framework, SAFe.  

Våra utvecklingsmiljöer omfattar bland annat Java, SpringBoot, Linux, Red Hat OpenShift (OCP), Kubernetes, React, GIT och Jenkins.  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 8 års aktuell erfarenhet av systemutveckling
* Relevant eftergymnasial IT-utbildning från högskola eller universitet
* Minst 5 års aktuell erfarenhet av programmering i Java med Spring
* Ha god förmåga att kommunicera i tal och skrift på Svenska

  

**Meriterande**  

* Erfarenhet av RedHat OpenShift (OCP)
* Erfarenhet av systemutveckling på Svensk myndighet
* Erfarenhet av ActiveMQ Classic och Artemis
* Erfarenhet av automation av Jenkins

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 05-12-2024 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Android software developer
description:
Are you passionate about Android development and eager to work in an exciting, global environment?


We are looking for an Android Developer to join one of our key clients in the automotive industry. Together with major players like Google, you will help develop world-class Android applications and services that support our client’s vision to be the most desired and successful provider of transport solutions and infrastructure worldwide.


As an Android Developer, you will have the chance to work with the latest technologies, design and build new features, and contribute to delivering high-quality applications that enhance the experience for customers across the brand. You will be part of an agile, cross-functional team responsible for the entire software lifecycle – from development to ensuring successful production deliveries.


We offer a dynamic and open culture with ample opportunities for growth and learning. If you're passionate about developing innovative Android applications and services within the automotive industry, this is your place!

### **Your Role:**

* Design, build, and maintain Android applications that meet customer needs.
* Ensure performance, quality, and productivity in the applications and services you develop.
* Take responsibility for the full software lifecycle, from ideation to deployment.
* Contribute to quality assurance efforts using techniques such as unit testing and integration testing.
* Collaborate with other team members to ensure smooth and successful delivery in production.

### **Requirements & Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electronics, or equivalent.
* Minimum 5 years of experience from software development
* Strong expertise in **Java** and **Kotlin**.
* Experience with commonly used Android design patterns and architectures.
* Knowledge of tools such as **Git**, **Jenkins**, **Jira**, and **Artifactory**.
* Experience with quality assurance techniques like **unit testing** and **integration testing** using tools such as **Espresso** and **JUnit**.


If you're ready to take on exciting challenges and grow your career in the automotive industry, apply today!

title: Embedded Developer /Combustion Engine Developer
description:
We are looking for an **Embedded Developer / Combustion Engine Developer** for a global automotive company in **Stockholm, Södertälje**.

**As a Functional developer** you are going to work with embedded programming and develop, analysing and testing our engine control system.


Furthermore we are looking for a developer with the following background:


Alternative 1: Combustion engine developer with programming experience.


Alternative 2: Embedded developer that is interested in working with engine development.


The group is developing software for the engine-ECU, so programming will be a part of the assignment.


**Qualifications and experience, to be successful in this role we see that you have:**

* M.Sc. Vehicle engineering, Mechanical engineering, Engineering physics, Mechatronics or equivalent Alt. Relevant working experience.
* Matlab programing skills
* C-programming skills
* **Fluent English is required. As the group is currently Swedish speaking an intermediate understanding of Swedish is required.**

**Meriting:**

* Knowledge about electrical system and/or embedded systems in vehicles.
* C/CE driver´s license.

**This is a full-time consultancy position through Incluso in Stockholm,** **Södertälje** **with 50% remote work possibility. Start is in January 2025, Two Year's limited contract to begin with, possibility of extension after that.**


For more information, please contact Kanika Singhal at kanika@incluso.se, recruiter at Incluso.

title: Pythonutvecklare med fokus på IT-infrastruktur och...
description:
**Är du en nyfiken utvecklare med erfarenhet av Python och ett intresse för IT-infrastruktur? Vill du vara med och utveckla innovativa lösningar som integrerar med nätverk och datacenter? Då kan du vara den vi söker!**

**Om rollen**  

Vi på Conscia söker en engagerad utvecklare som har erfarenhet av Python och grundläggande kunskaper i verktyg som Kubernetes och CI/CD. Du kommer att ingå i ett team med en enormt viktig uppgift - att säkerställa Conscias relevans i framtiden genom innovation och utveckling. Vi stöttar varandra inom DevOps-principer och arbetar tillsammans för att skapa nydanande, effektiva och skalbara lösningar. Din nyfikenhet och ditt intresse för ny teknik kommer att vara en viktig drivkraft i rollen.


Du kommer att arbeta med spännande och innovativa projekt där du utvecklar i huvudsak två system. Det första systemet är vitalt för våra ledande managerade tjänster eftersom det hanterar infrastrukturen hos våra kunder, vilket inkluderar tusentals enheter, med hjälp av automatisering, larmhantering och integrationer mot stödsystem. Det andra systemet är ett automatiseringsramverk byggt på våra erfarenheter från stora automatiseringsprojekt för IT-infrastruktur, som med hjälp av OpenSource-baserade verktyg hjälper våra kunder att automatisera sin IT-infrastruktur och tillåta självbetjäning - både i egna datacenter och i molnet.

**Kvalifikationer:**

* **Gedigen erfarenhet av Python-programmering**
* Förståelse för och praktisk erfarenhet av **DevOps-metodik**, inklusive:
* Användning av **Git** för versionshantering
* **CI/CD**-processer och pipeline-uppbyggnad
* **Testning** och ett starkt **säkerhetstänk** i utvecklingsarbetet
* Förmåga att diagnostisera och **felsöka komplexa system**
* Kompetens att läsa, tolka och utveckla **REST-API**

**Meriterande erfarenheter:**

* Erfarenhet av att utveckla med **AWS-tjänster** eller andra molnplattformar
* Kunskaper inom **containerteknologier** och **Kubernetes**
* Erfarenhet av verktyg för **Infrastructure as Code**, såsom **Ansible** och **Terraform**
* Grundläggande förståelse för **databaser** och databashantering
* Fördjupad kunskap inom **nätverk** och **infrastruktur**
* Erfarenhet av **andra programmeringsspråk** utöver Python

**Vem är du?**  

Vi söker dig som är nyfiken, intresserad och har en vilja att lära dig nya saker. Du trivs med att arbeta i team och delar gärna med dig av din kunskap. Du har ett intresse för både utveckling och infrastruktur och vill vara med och bygga system som gör skillnad.

**Varför Conscia?**  

På Conscia erbjuder vi:

* **Spännande interna projekt** där du får möjlighet att påverka och utvecklas
* **En kultur som uppmuntrar nyfikenhet och lärande**, med tillgång till utbildningar och certifieringar
* **Ett stödjande team** som arbetar enligt DevOps-principer och värdesätter samarbete
* **Flexibla arbetsformer** som möjliggör en bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv
* **Möjlighet att arbeta med avancerad IT-infrastruktur** och teknik i framkant

**Ansökan**  

Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och bli en del av Conscias utvecklingsteam? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag!

description:

**Om tjänsten**

  

Företaget har nu ett spännande uppdrag hos kund där man kommer vara med och utveckla radar och säkerhetssystem.

* Du kommer att arbeta med olika tekniker för att bland annat utveckla flygburna radarsystem.
* Du kommer främst att jobba fram utvecklingen inom radarsensorer och övervakningssystem, men även antenner, signalbehandling och mjukvara.

* Du kommer få tillgång till långsiktiga utvecklingsmöjligheter inom ett dynamiskt och kontinuerligt växande område, där du har en stark direkt påverkan på kundnöjdheten.

**Du och dina färdigheter:**

* Vi ser att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med projekt inom radar-och övervakningssystem.
* Vi ser gärna att du har god erfarenhet av att arbeta inom hårdvaruutveckling.
* Tidigare arbetat med programspråk så som C++, Python samt goda CAD-kunskaper i CREO/ProEngineer..

title: Android Developer
description:
Marshall Group is the audio, tech, and design powerhouse uniting musicians and music lovers through genre-breaking innovation. Our flagship brand, Marshall, is uniquely positioned with over 60 years of rock ‘n’ roll attitude on stage, at home, and on the go. Our iconic products are brought to life by a dedicated team of 800 passionate employees and sold in over 90 markets worldwide.

**Right now,** we need to strengthen our Software team with a Android developer that will be working with our cross-functional teams. The world of audio is changing. Smart speakers and True Wireless headphones are turning audio into a high-tech industry. In the last few years, our products have gone from simple wired devices to connected and complex IoT devices. We are now focusing on evolving our mobile app and the added value it can provide to our users.

**What you’ll do:**


* Maintain and develop Android mobile apps for the Marshall brands
* Collaborate closely with our UX and Design team to discuss new features and functions.
* Support and participate in testing activities and evaluation of the app.
* Participate in knowledge-sharing sessions to promote new ideas and innovation.
* Teamwork with the other developers to help us brainstorm solutions and make our apps even better for our users.
* Prototyping new ideas to make them come true, both individually and across teams.

**Who we’re looking for:**


You are an Android developer with a collaborative mindset who cooperates well internally and externally. To succeed in this role, you need to be committed to collaborative problem-solving, and build quality products to create great user experiences together with the UX and design team. We believe you have a great passion for new technologies, trends, and software development. You get excited by the idea of creating an amazing app experience that resonates with people not only on a functional level but also on an emotional level.

**You probably have the following experiences & skills:**

* + 2 years of proven professional Android app development experience.
* Experience working with Kotlin.
* Proficient in modern android design patterns (for ex. MVVM, dependency injection) and Jetpack components.
* Familiarity with coroutines and Compose, Dagger Hilt and Clean Architecture.
* Good understanding of Firebase & REST etc.
* Hence strong written and spoken English skills are essential.
* Experience with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) is a plus.

**Our pledge:**


We thrive to foster an inclusive workplace and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, disability, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age or marital status. We firmly believe that Marshall thrives when our employees do, leading to better experiences for our consumers.


We encourage applications from all over the world. To enable transitioning from another country for a role at Marshall, we offer re-location support. This support is tailored for each role but always includes visa/work permit application, local authority registration, and home finding service. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.

**Does this sound like you?**


We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Software Developer, IOT
description:
**Qamcom is growing and we are looking for a talented Software Developer in IOT to join our Qamcom office in Stockholm!**


Qamcom Research and Technology is a dynamic hub of innovation, offering specialist consulting services and product development with an emphasis on intelligent, connected systems. Our expertise spans a wide range of areas including sensors and radars, image and signal processing, embedded HW and SW, multi-modal AI analytics, and wireless communication systems, as well as application software, edge-cloud infrastructure, and functional safety.


Our team possesses the comprehensive skills necessary to develop complete products for serial production. We can take ownership of every aspect of the development chain from the initial design to the final product.

#### **About the role**


In this role you will work in different product development projects in different sectors all the way from early stage idea to final implementation of entire systems. You will specialize in designing, developing highly maintainable software solutions for Internet of Things (IoT) and connected devices and systems. You will be a valuable member of our team, contributing to every step of the product development process.

#### **Who are you?**

You are an innovative Software Developer with embedded system experience, bringing valuable experience to the team. You are communicative, open, and eager to generate new ideas. You enjoy working closely with your colleagues but are also comfortable working independently. * Generous parental leave (90% of the salary).

***Join us at*** ***Qamcom******, where your expertise will contribute to shaping the future of technology and innovation****.*

title: Backend Software Engineer (.Net Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
* Create systems that are not only scalable but also resilient, ensuring graceful failure.
* Manage the software lifecycle from design and development to testing and production deployment.
* Work with a range of different technologies and programming languages, but primarily with C# and .NET Core.
* Actively contribute to enhancing our development processes and pipelines.
* Take a hands-on approach to monitoring production environments, identifying issues, and being on-call when necessary.
* Engage closely with software engineers, architects, DevOps specialists, and product managers to deliver exceptional products.


**Requirements**
* Experienced professional in team-based development, deployment, and maintenance of software products in production.
* In-depth knowledge of .NET Core and a deep passion for technology.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
* Ability to work effectively within a cross-functional self-organizing team, fostering collaboration and mutual respect among team members.
* A passion for writing clean and testable code.
* Bachelor's degree in computer science or related technical discipline.


**Good to have**
* Experience in a similar industry or related one.
* Experience working with service-oriented architecture and distributed systems.
* Experience with Kubernetes or similar technologies.
* Experience working with AWS.
* Proven ability to work with others to solve tough technical problems.
* Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment characteristic of agile development methodologies.
* Experience guiding and mentoring fellow developers empowering them to contribute effectively to team goals.


 Embrace the challenge and join us!
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Android Developer to Svea Bank
description:
We are looking for a developer with a passion for Android, who wants to be part of an ambitious cross-functional team that works closely with the business to create the best possible payments app! Do you have a few years of experience of Kotlin, a drive to always improve yourself and those around you and want to be part of a fast-paced company?
   

  

**About The Role**
 In this role, you will work in a self-organized team consisting of Android and iOS developers, QA and UI/UX professionals. The team also collaborates closely with the backend team (.Net). As an Android Developer in our team, you will have the opportunity to be involved in and contribute to further develop and maintain our Svea Pay app. Your daily work consists mainly of:
   

  

* Writing clean and scalable code in Kotlin
* Close collaboration with your team members in executing test-driven development, unit-testing and test automation
* Implementing new features as well as experimenting with new tools and ways of working along the road
* Ensure and ship the best possible code through clean code principles
* Act as a true advisor within your expertise to product owners and other team members in devising technical solutions to business requirements
* Par-programming, crossprogramming across both Android/iOS/.Net


**Competences we think you have:**
* A few years experience in Android development specifically
* Ability to write clean, testable code in both Java and Kotlin
* A good understanding of Android development and its design patterns and architecture
* Fluent professional English in both speaking and writing
* Understanding of Swedish and willingness to learn more is great


**Who are you?**
 In this role we see a person who value team efforts over personal efforts, who is always interested in further developing yourself! You have a can-do attitude, love problem solving and if you have a natural ability to act as a spokesperson for your team that is great. Furthermore, you have a good understanding for the product-lifecycle and business aspects, which gives you the ability to take on a helicopter-perspective. Of course, you also have an interest in new technologies!
   

  

 If you also have know-how regarding UI and UX development, experience with continuous integration, automation, system architecture and design that’s a bonus!
   

  

**Why join us?**
 With us, you will be part of an exciting journey, where we create and shape tomorrows financial and business solutions for Sveas customers. Being a Svea employee means a steep development curve with the opportunity to work on new projects, experiment with modern technologies, and try on various roles. Here, you will have a whole team behind you, who are always ready to back you up, take in your ideas and input, aren’t shy to challenge and help you level up your way of working. It is this familiar and entrepreneurial spirit that is the key to our success.
   

  

**About Svea**
*Svea is a fintech company with operations in several European countries. For more than 40 years, we have served as a financing partner to companies and thereby helped them reach and exceed their goals! Being a part of Svea means being a part of a dynamic and exciting workplace! We are an entrepreneurial company providing a vast scope of financial services. Here initiative is appreciated, and as our employee your knowledge and input will be highly valued. We are located in Arenastaden, Solna, next to Mall of Scandinavia.*
**Application**
 We do not accept applications via e-mail.
   

  

 If you have any questions regarding the position you are welcome to contact recuiter Sanna Löfgren at sanna.lofgren@svea.com.

title: System Developer - Feature Team
description:
RaySearch has several cancer care products, and we are now looking to add more talented developers to our RayCare product.
   

  

**About RayCare**
 RayCare is a client-server application that runs on premises at many clinics all over the world. RayCare takes care of and helps clinical staff to coordinate their work at the clinic. For example, workflow management, patient chart details and treatment management. RayCare is an innovative oncology information system (OIS) designed to support the complex challenges of modern oncology clinics. It is developed to streamline workflows in cancer clinics to facilitate efficient care faster to more patients. RayCare is used by all staff at the clinic, e.g., physicians, physicists, treatment planners etc. and is used in all steps of patient care, from registration to radiation treatment at the treatment machine and for treatment follow-up. RayCare is integrated with RayStation and its treatment tools but also with external products and supports communication via HL7 as well as DICOM.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a feature developer in RayCare, you will be part of designing and implementing a robust and modern oncology information system. We value problem-solving skills and a structured approach, but also a willingness to collaborate and learn from your peers. RayCare has high demands on sustainable software development, with a focus on excellent code quality and maintaining best practices. Your contributions will help ensure that our software meets the high standards required for improving cancer care, and we encourage open communication and teamwork to find the best solutions.
   

  

**Your profile**
 You have excellent analytic skills, you identify different components of problems, see the connections between them and understand the impact of various proposed solutions. You take responsibility and check that nothing is left to chance or missed when implementing new functionality. You take pride in delivering code with superior quality.
   

  

**Requirements**
* M.Sc. in Engineering Physics, Computer Science or equivalent academic degree
* Minimum seven years of .NET development experience with complex products
* Highly skilled in C#.NET
* Experience with client-server based systems
* Knowledge of domain-driven design


**Meriting**
* Experience of working in an agile environment
* Experience from the MedTech-industry or other regulated industries
* Experience of framework development of mission critical systems
* Knowledge of event-sourcing and CQRS
* Databases such as SQL Server
* Front-end development with frameworks such as WPF and/or Web technologies such as TypeScript, Angular, etc.


**Our Culture**
 Culture at RaySeach is the driving force behind our organization
 **, where** 
 everything we do is driven by a shared passion for innovation and the fight against cancer. Our dedication is reflected in our ability
 **to deliver** 
 exceptional results,
 **pay** 
 close attention to detail, and consistently
 **go** 
 the extra mile. Our employees stand out as experts in
 **their** 
 field
 **, driven by** 
 a relentless focus on solving problems
 **-** 
 no matter how complex. At RaySearch, we take pride in
 **leading the way in** 
 cancer treatment, leveraging cutting-edge technology to develop innovative
 **solutions** 
 that make a real difference in patient care.
   

  

**Our Offer**
 At RaySearch, we offer a diverse and inclusive work environment, fostering openness, sincerity, and collaboration. Located in Hagastaden, Stockholm's Life Science Hub, our modern and creative workspace includes an in-house gym, yoga, and social activities like ping pong, table football, and regular after-work events. Our bistro serves a fantastic lunch buffet, and we offer morning- and afternoon-fika every day. Our rooftop terrace also provides a stunning 360-degree view of Stockholm, enhancing the work experience. All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package.
   

  

**Application**
 Please apply to the position through the application form below. We do not accept applications by e-mail. Selection and interviews will be ongoing.

title: Staff Software Engineer Back End (Bangkok based – Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**Get to Know our Team**
 In Agoda’s Back-End Engineering department, we build scalable, fault-tolerant systems and APIs that host our core business logic. Our systems cover all major areas of our business: inventory and pricing, product information, customer data, communications, partner data, booking systems, payments, and more. We employ state-of-the-art CI/CD and testing techniques to ensure everything works without downtime. Our systems are self-healing, responding gracefully to extreme loads or unexpected input. We use modern languages like Kotlin and Scala, Data technologies Kafka, Spark, MLflow, Kubeflow, VastStorage, StarRocks and agile development practices. Most importantly, we hire great people from around the world and empower them to be successful.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 Agoda Platform team is looking for developers to work on mission-critical systems that serve millions of users daily. You will have the chance to work on innovative projects, using cutting-edge technologies, and make a significant impact on our business and the travel industry.
   

  

**What You’ll Need To Succeed**
* 8+ years of experience developing performance-critical applications in a production environment using Scala, Java, Kotlin, C#, Go or relevant modern programming languages.
* Strong RDBMS knowledge (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, or other).
* Ability to direct significant company-wide projects and sets technical vision.
* Good command of the English language.
* Deeply involved in making architectural decisions, setting the standard and direction for the team.
* Implement advanced CI/CD pipelines and robust testing strategies to ensure seamless integration, deployment, and high code quality.
* Passion for software development and continuous improvement of your knowledge and skills.


**It’s Great if You Have**
* Knowledge in NoSQL, Queueing systems (Kafka, RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, MSMQ), and Play framework.

title: SDE II - iOS Software Developer, Sye
PROCESS DEVELOPER ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE
description:
Short Description
   

  

 Are you passionate about accounts receivable processes and thrive in a role that places you at the core of operations? Do you enjoy turning ideas into action? If so, this position could be your perfect match!
   

  

 As a Process Developer - Accounts Receivable, you’ll play a key role in driving transformation and advancing our AR processes.
   

  

 Purpose
   

  

 In this dynamic role, you’ll support our local AR team by overseeing and evaluating processes and projects. Your responsibilities will include managing reminders and collections, as well as KPI reporting.
   

  

 Your role will involve building strong relationships across the organization, and your ability to collaborate with internal and external stakeholders will be essential. Together with our process leaders, you’ll also support our BPO partners in their daily operations.
   

  

 Your Team: Finance – Accounts Receivable/Accounts Payable
   

  

 You’ll join a high-performing and diverse team of talented professionals from varied backgrounds. Our team values collaboration, innovation, and a commitment to excellence. We foster a supportive and inclusive work environment where everyone can thrive and succeed.
   

  

**Experience**
 We believe that to succeed in this role, you have:
   

  

* An interest and understanding of accounts receivable; you may be at the early stages of your career.
* Proficiency in ERP systems, invoice operators, and Excel.
* An interest in digital solutions, such as RPA (Robotic Process Automation).
* A thorough, patient, and process-oriented approach, combined with strong analytical skills and a drive to achieve results and improve processes.
* Fluency in both Swedish and English, in speech and writing.
* Relevant formal education is preferred but can be substituted with experience in finance or AR.
* Effective communication skills, both written and verbal.
* A commitment to working from the office at least three days per week.


 Other of Importance
   

  

**What We Offer You**
 At SAS, we provide extensive opportunities for professional growth in a fast-paced, international environment. We prioritize the continuous development of our employees and offer a range of benefits:
   

  

* Travel Perks: discounted travel opportunities worldwide with SAS.
* Health & Wellness: Access health benefits and a newly renovated gym with complimentary classes, such as CrossFit and yoga.
* Discounts: Benefit from discounts on a wide range of brands, airport transportation, airport shops, hotels, and car rentals.
* Work Environment: Our Frösundavik office provides a vibrant workspace with a restaurant, café, and access to outdoor activities like running, tennis, kayaking, and more in nearby Hagaparken and Brunnsviken.
* Convenient Commute: Utilize a direct bus service connecting our office to Central Station, Solna station, and commuter trains, as well as an extensive cycle path network.


**Ready to Join Us?**
 If this sounds like you, come fly with us!
   

  

 For questions about this position, please contact Katarina Ratcliffe, Manager of Accounts Payable/Accounts Receivable, at Katarina.Ratcliffe@sas.se.
   

  

 Last day of applications: 15th December
   

  

 Please submit your CV as soon as possible, as interviews are conducted on an ongoing basis and the position may be filled before the application deadline.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!

 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**Get to Know our Team**
 In Agoda’s Back-End Engineering department, we build scalable, fault-tolerant systems and APIs that host our core business logic. Our systems cover all major areas of our business: inventory and pricing, product information, customer data, communications, partner data, booking systems, payments, and more. We employ state-of-the-art CI/CD and testing techniques to ensure everything works without downtime. Our systems are self-healing, responding gracefully to extreme loads or unexpected input. We use modern languages like Kotlin and Scala, Data technologies Kafka, Spark, MLflow, Kubeflow, VastStorage, StarRocks and agile development practices. Most importantly, we hire great people from around the world and empower them to be successful.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 Agoda Platform team is looking for developers to work on mission-critical systems that serve millions of users daily. You will have the chance to work on innovative projects, using cutting-edge technologies, and make a significant impact on our business and the travel industry.
   

  

**What You’ll Need To Succeed**
* 10+ years of experience developing performance-critical applications in a production environment using Scala, Java, Kotlin, C#, Go or relevant modern programming languages.
* Strong RDBMS knowledge (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, or other).
* Ability to direct significant company-wide projects and sets technical vision.
* Good command of the English language.
* Deeply involved in making architectural decisions, setting the standard and direction for the team.
* Implement advanced CI/CD pipelines and robust testing strategies to ensure seamless integration, deployment, and high code quality.
* Passion for software development and continuous improvement of your knowledge and skills.


**It’s Great if You Have**
* Knowledge in NoSQL, Queueing systems (Kafka, RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, MSMQ), and Play framework.

title: Hydrocyclone Service Engineer
description:
Valmet is a leading global developer and supplier of technologies, automation, and services for the pulp, paper, and energy industries. We are committed to helping our customers improve their performance and sustainability.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 We are seeking a dedicated and skilled Hydrocyclones Service Engineer to join our team. This role involves extensive travel within the region to support and follow up on our customers’ hydrocyclones and screen installations. The main objective is to perform mechanical inspections, process audits, maintenance services, process optimization, troubleshooting, fine-tuning, and training of customer operators’ staff. Additionally, the role includes direct involvement in service sales and technical support for customers and local sales teams.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Proactively plan, communicate, and visit customers in the region.
* Perform mechanical inspections and process audits at customer sites.
* Install sold wear and spare parts at customer sites.
* Perform maintenance services and process optimization at customer sites.
* Troubleshoot and fine-tune installed equipment at customer sites.
* Train customer operators’ staff and provide technical support to local sales teams.
* Write objective service reports after every inspection/service, including findings and recommendations, and store them in M-files.
* Follow up on sales quotes (spare parts, field service, upgrades/rebuilds).
* Check customers’ inventory and make recommended spare parts lists.
* Identify potential upgrade/rebuild needs.
* Update and populate existing SPR equipment and improvements in the installed base.
* Generate HSE observations and CI reports.


**Qualifications**
 Knowledge with more than 1 years’ experience working with Hydrocyclones products.
   

  

 Market and customer knowledge, basic IT tools knowledge, mechanical engineering skills, willingness to travel extensively.
   

  

* Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) in a technical field or equivalent experience as well as knowledge of given process equipment and machinery in production environment from the pulp and paper industry.
* Ability to identify sales opportunities during troubleshooting discussions.
* Ability to inspect hydrocyclone parts and screen baskets.
* Ability to handle multiple assignments and adapting to changing priorities.
* Capability to work under time pressure, with a strong commitment and sense of responsibility.
* Good cooperation skills, social, open minded and service oriented. Hands-on attitude and not afraid of getting hands dirty.
* Ability and willingness to learn new software tools. Basic understanding of simulation and process calculations are expected.
* 1-2 years’ experience from working with a business system.
* Fluent computer usage and proficiency in various software programs.
* Good communication skills in English, both written and oral are expected.
* Willingness to travel overnight.
* The position requires a great deal of independent work. A proactive attitude to fill in your own agenda is expected.


 In addition, you communicate fluently both verbally and in writing in one of the languages of your region. You have good communication and negotiation skills, which enable you to operate in a business environment. IT and automation skills would be highly appreciated, as we are developing and adding remote condition monitoring capabilities to these products.
   

  

**Why Join Us**
 At Valmet, we offer a dynamic and supportive work environment where you can grow your career and make a significant impact. We provide opportunities for professional development and a chance to work with cutting-edge technologies in the industry.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 If you are passionate about providing exceptional service and have the skills and experience required for this role, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and cover letter. Please apply as soon as possible, but no later than December 15, 2024
   

  

***When everything works together***
*Valmet is where the best talent from a wide variety of backgrounds comes together. With 19 000 professionals around the world, we are the leading global developer and supplier of technologies, automation and services for the pulp, paper and energy industries. Our commitment to moving our customers’ performance forward requires creativity, technological innovations, service know-how – and above all, teamwork.*
***Join the team! www.valmet.com/careers***

description:

**Jobbeskrivning**
 I rollen som funktionell eBS expert är du specialist på funktionaliteten i Oracle eBS och ansvarar för att konfigurera systemet för att passa in i vår verksamhet. Du får goda kunskaper om de verksamhetsprocesser som systemet ska stödja och du för diskussioner med processägare, slutanvändare, lösningsarkitekter och utvecklare (eBS tekniker) m.fl. Du deltar i test av systemet och i förekommande fall även verifieringar i produktion. Som medarbetare i teamet är du en del av ett välfungerade team på it-avdelningen med uppgift att både stötta daglig verksamhet och att genomföra ny- och vidareutveckling. Arbetet bedrivs med agilt arbetssätt vilket innebär att du ska vara bekväm med agila arbetsmetoder och aktivt bidra till att gruppen lyckas med agilt utvecklingsarbete.

* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av modulerna AR, AP och GL i Oracle eBS

* God förståelse för det tekniska ramverket som Oracle eBS bygger på samt välbekant med de riktlinjer som gäller för att konfigurera lösningar och tillägg till standardsystemets funktionalitet
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av dokumentation enligt Oracle eBS standard

title: Praktikant-annons: UX Designer för webben
description:
**Praktikannons: UX Designer för webben**

Är du en passionerad UX-designer redo att ge dig ut på en transformativ resa i webbdesignvärlden? Gå med som praktikant och fördjupa dig i en miljö som främjar kreativitet, innovation och praktisk erfarenhet!

**Om oss:**

RedRiver Consulting and Software AB, är ett ledande konsult- och produktföretag specialiserat på system- och webbutveckling. Med en meritlista av att leverera skräddarsydda IT-lösningar och ge löpande support till några av Sveriges största företag och offentliga myndigheter, är vi stolta över vårt engagemang för spetskompetens och innovation. Vår expertis ligger i Angular 2-11 och React för frontend-utveckling och .NET Core och C# för backend-lösningar

**Praktikdetaljer:**

Roll: UX Designer för Web Intern

Krav:

* Kunskaper i UX-designprinciper med fokus på webbgränssnitt.
* Bekantskap med designverktyg som Sketch, Figma eller Adobe XD.
* En passion för användarcentrerad design och att skapa sömlösa digitala upplevelser.
* Stark kommunikationsförmåga för att samarbeta effektivt med tvärfunktionella team.

Ansvar:

* Arbeta nära vårt dynamiska team i verkliga projekt, ingjuta din kreativa känsla i UX-design.
* Använd användarcentrerade designmetoder för att skapa visuellt tilltalande och intuitiva webbgränssnitt.
* Samarbeta i agila miljöer, delta i SCRUM eller andra iterativa utvecklingsmetoder.
* Bidra med idéer och lösningar för att förbättra användarupplevelsen på olika plattformar.

title: Chief Revenue Officer (CRO) - CDI - Paris
description:
Since 2014, Wiremind has positioned itself as a **tecH company** transforming the world of transport and events with a 360° approach combining **UX, software, and AI**.


Our expertise lies primarily in **optimizing and marketing** our clients' capacity. We work on various projects such as **ticket forecasting and pricing**, **3D optimization of air freight or scraping competitor prices**. Our applications are the preferred tool **of companies** such as SNCF, United Airlines, Qatar Airways or even PSG to visualize, analyze and optimize their capacity.


Dynamic and ambitious, we strive to maintain our technical DNA which is the engine of our success. The company, profitable and self-financed since its creation 10 years ago, is mainly composed **of engineers and experts** and currently supports the growth of our **business model** based on "software-as-a-service" solutions.  

  

As **we scale**, we are looking for a visionary Chief Revenue Officer (CRO) to lead our revenue strategies and play a pivotal role in shaping our future growth.

### **Your missions**

As the Chief Revenue Officer at Wiremind, you will be responsible for driving all revenue-generating activities, ensuring alignment across sales, marketing, customer success, and business development. Reporting directly to the CEO, you will define and implement strategies that accelerate growth, enhance customer acquisition and retention, and expand market share.

  

**Strategic Leadership**

* Develop and execute a comprehensive revenue growth strategy aligned with Wiremind’s business objectives.
* Collaborate with the executive team to define long-term goals and establish a scalable revenue model.

Identify new market opportunities and design entry strategies to capture them.  
* 

**Sales and Business Development**

* Lead and grow the sales team, setting ambitious but achievable revenue targets.
* Establish and refine the sales processes and methodologies, sales forecasts, ensuring data-driven decision-making and continuous improvement.

Build strong relationships with key clients and partners to foster long-term business growth.  
* 

**Marketing and Branding**

* Oversee marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and generate qualified leads.
* Ensure seamless collaboration between marketing and sales teams to maximize conversion rates.

Analyze market trends and competitor activity to maintain Wiremind’s competitive edge.  
* 

**Customer Success (to be discussed)**

* Drive initiatives that enhance customer satisfaction, retention, and expansion.
* Develop frameworks to measure and improve customer lifetime value (CLV).

Align customer success efforts with revenue growth goals, ensuring a seamless customer journey.  
* 

**Data-Driven Approach**

* Implement analytics tools to track performance metrics across sales, marketing, and customer success.
* Leverage insights to refine strategies and ensure optimal resource allocation.

**Team Leadership**

* Build and inspire a high-performing revenue team, fostering a culture of collaboration and excellence.
* Mentor and develop team members to achieve personal and organizational goals.

### **Your profile**

**Experience**

* Proven track record in a senior revenue leadership role, preferably within a high-growth B2B technology or SaaS company.
* Extensive experience in sales, marketing, and business development, with demonstrated success in scaling revenue streams.
* Strong familiarity with the European market; experience in Paris or other major European hubs is a plus.

**Skills and Attributes**

* Strategic thinker with exceptional execution skills.
* Outstanding leadership and team-building abilities.
* Data-driven mindset with a strong understanding of key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics.
* Excellent communication and negotiation skills, capable of influencing stakeholders at all levels.
* Entrepreneurial spirit with a passion for innovation and growth.
* Willingness to travel frequently for events, market visits, and business development

**Education**

* Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or a related field; an MBA is a strong advantage.

**Language Requirements**

* Fluency in English is mandatory; proficiency in French is highly desirable.

### **Our benefits**

By joining us, you will integrate:

* A self-financed startup with a strong tech identity!
* Beautiful 800 m² offices in the heart of Paris (Bd Poissonnière)
* Attractive remuneration indexed on performance
* A caring and stimulating team that encourages skills development through initiative and autonomy
* A learning environment with opportunities for evolution ‍


You will also benefit from:

* A hybrid policy: 2 days of remote work per week and the possibility to work occasionally from abroad
A great company culture (monthly afterworks, regular meetings on technology and products, annual off-site seminars, team-building…)  
* 

Wiremind is committed to **equality of opportunity, diversity, and fairness**. We encourage all **candidates** with the necessary experience to apply for our job offers.

title: Founding Engineer - Typescript Full-stack
description:
**About Normain**
-----------------


Founded in 2023, Normain is an AI platform for knowledge work. Our product lets highly paid, highly skilled employees scale their expertise with AI.


We’re on a mission to fundamentally transform knowledge work away from repetitive, boring tasks that are often part of the work domain experts do. Instead, we envision a world where AI lets humans be more human, and domain experts can spread their expertise and knowledge in ways that actually have a great impact for the better: by listening to- and building empathy with their clients—while AI takes care of the rest.


With some of Stockholm’s best tech advisors and business angels onboard as our extended team, we’re ready to kickstart Normain’s next chapter.

**About the Role**
------------------


We’re a diverse and passionate team of three co-founders looking for a Founding Engineer that will join Normain at the earliest part of our journey. We bring expertise from Boston Consulting Group, Stanford, and other Nordic startups to build something truly great. In this role, you will get the opportunity to shape Normain’s technology at its core. This is a rare opportunity to join the ride of a lifetime, and be an integral part of it from the very beginning. No startup journey is ever easy, but we believe the opportunity of AI excites you, and that you don’t mind putting in the hard work if you get to do it with people you enjoy working with—on a mission you believe in.


In this role, you will work closely with the whole team, but especially with our technical Co-founder Kalle Hansson. Kalle has almost 20 years of experience from full-stack development, and spent most of his time before Normain as CTO & Co-founder at other tech startups. Together with Kalle and the other Engineers, you will form our core Engineering team. You will all work broadly with implementing features required to deliver on Normain’s short-and long-term roadmap.


It’s paramount that the platform we build is performant from an AI perspective, and is easy to use for non-technical stakeholders. It requires us to translate technological concepts like RAG, prompt engineering, and fine-tuning into UX concepts that can be easily understood and used by our customers. We believe you either have some thoughts on how to best solve these challenges, or are eager to learn.

**What you’ll do**
------------------

### **Feature development**

* Drive Normain’s innovation by implementing cutting-edge features into our platform and its infrastructure.
* Contribute to shaping Normain's technology foundation, focusing on scalability, security, and operational excellence to deliver on our ambitious product roadmap.

### **AI solutions**

* Translate complex AI concepts into intuitive UX designs, ensuring our technology is accessible and impactful for niche consulting firms.
* Optimize AI output and model performance, employing the latest techniques like RAG and, prompt engineering, and—later down the line— fine-tuning to deliver scalable solutions.

**Technical skills**
--------------------

### **We believe you have**

* Proficiency in TypeScript, with extensive experience in building robust and scalable web applications.
* Experience with React.
* Proficiency in building and maintaining APIs. Experience with Node.js or other server-side languages compatible with TypeScript.
* Strong experience from working with SQL databases.

### **Extra points if you have**

* Experience using Azure's AI solutions
* Experience from self-hosting LLMs
* Experience in using tRPC
* Experience with integrating GenAI APIs (e.g. OpenAI, Gemini and/or Mistral) and/or working with AI/ML models.
* An understanding of AI/ML concepts and experience in applying them to real-world problems.

**Soft skills**
---------------

### **We believe you have**

* Experience from working in cross-functional teams where you collaborated with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders.
* A strong sense of ownership and accountability.
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

### **Extra points if you have**

* Proven leadership experience in a senior engineering role.
* Ability to mentor and guide junior engineers and influence the technical direction of the company.
* Ability to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

**Other qualifications**
------------------------

### **We believe you have**

* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues efficiently.
* A graduate degree in engineering or similar discipline from a tier one university.
* Experience from working at a technology startup, and like the rapid pace.

### **Extra points if you have**

* Experience from navigating through a high growth phase of a startup company.
* Experience from taking a product from zero to one, i.e. laying the very foundation of a product in a rapidly changing environment.

**Culture**
-----------

### **We believe you will enjoy working at Normain if you:**

* Are passionate about the latest AI technology.
* Enjoy receiving and acting on feedback and improvement suggestions from your co-workers.
* Are curious about others’ perspectives, especially if they are different from your own.
* Enjoy the autonomy, responsibility, day-to-day changes, and short deadlines that working at an early-stage startup entails.
* Think the work you do and how it contributes to the mission is much more important than your title.
* Like having a good time with your colleagues at work.
* Believe that mental and physical well-being improves your ability to do your best work.
* Have a strong sense of integrity and inner compass about what’s wrong and what’s right.

title: Toxic söker UX/UI-designer
description:
Vi söker en UX/UI-designer som delar vår passion för att skapa innovativa digitala upplevelser. Rollen – och hela UX/UI-teamet – är en central del av vårt arbete och en viktig resurs för våra utvecklingsteam. Därför letar vi efter dig som förstår vikten av konsultrollen och kan leverera design som både inspirerar och skapar affärsvärde men också förstår hur teamets arbete hänger ihop med helhetsleveransen.

**Om rollen**  

Som UX/UI-designer hos oss har du en nyckelroll i att skapa genomtänkta, användarvänliga och inspirerande designlösningar. Du och UX/UI-teamet arbetar nära våra sex utvecklingsteam för att säkerställa att designen levereras i rätt steg. Tillsammans, med ett agilt arbetssätt, hjälper vi våra kunder att lyfta sin digitala närvaro till nya nivåer.

**Rollen innebär att du:**

* Ansvarar för att designen håller högsta kvalitet och följer kundens profil.
* Arbetar iterativt i Figma, där du skapar designsystem, wireframes och prototyper.
* Har nära dialog med kunder för att förstå deras behov och presentera dina designval på ett inspirerande och professionellt sätt.
* Skapar en brygga mellan design och utveckling genom god kundförståelse.
* Levererar designspråk och lösningar som lyfter helheten i våra projekt.
* Tillämpas riktlinjer enligt tillgänglighetsdirektivet (WCAG) för att skapa inkluderande digitala lösningar.
* Är självgående men också lyhörd – en lagspelare som kombinerar kreativitet med affärsnytta.

**Vi tror att du har:**

* Några års erfarenhet som designer, gärna på byrå eller som konsult.
* En portfolio som visar hur du omvandlat kundinsikter till kraftfull design.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av Figma som designverktyg.
* Förståelse för hur design bidrar till affärsnytta och förmågan att kommunicera detta.
* Kunskap om tillgänglighetsdirektivet (WCAG) och erfarenhet av att skapa tillgängliga lösningar.
* Förmågan att driva designprocesser från idé till leverans självständigt.
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt och relaterade verktyg.

**Vad vi erbjuder**  

Hos oss på Toxic får du mer än bara en arbetsplats – du blir en del av en kultur som både stöttar och utmanar. Vår styrka ligger i våra unika bakgrunder och passioner, som tillsammans skapar något större.


Vi utvecklar kundunika digitala lösningar inom:

* Webb
* E-handel
* Appar
* System


Vi arbetar med plattformar som Litium, Umbraco, Umbraco Commerce, Norce och SiteVision.

**Praktisk information**

* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Placering: Jönköping
* Lön: Individuell lönesättning
* Omfattning: Enligt överenskommelse
* Sista ansökningsdatum: Fredag 6 december
